archimate:CommunicationNetwork.name: [Pole] Low Bandwidth Channels (Communication Network)
archimate:CommunicationNetwork.documentation: This is a channel consisting of whatever bandwidth is available at the time Pole Undecorated Alerts are produced. In the current baseline it may be the Iridium Multi-Channel System (IMCS), which is a set of channel-bonded 32 baud links.
